characteristics.name: Response Speed
characteristics.description: The user consistently responds within a short time frame, indicating their ability to prioritize and manage multiple interactions.

options.description: Responses may take some time to arrive

characteristics.name: Tone Consistency
characteristics.description: The user maintains a consistent tone across their interactions, conveying a clear and respectful attitude.

options.description: Tone shifts or veers off course

characteristics.name: Emotional Expression
characteristics.description: The user openly expresses their emotions, making them more relatable and endearing to others.

characteristics.name: Directness
characteristics.description: The user prefers direct and straightforward communication, avoiding unnecessary embellishments.

characteristics.name: Engagement
characteristics.description: The user actively engages with others, showing genuine interest in conversations.

characteristics.name: Humor
characteristics.description: The user incorporates humor into their conversations, making interactions more enjoyable.

characteristics.name: Empathy
characteristics.description: The user demonstrates understanding and compassion for others' perspectives.

characteristics.name: Creativity
characteristics.description: The user thinks outside the box, generating innovative ideas and responses.
